item.title: Socialist group ‘By Any Means Necessary’ escalates campaign to ‘stop’ Turning Point USA
item.description: Berkeley teacher Yvette Felarca leads "By Any Means Necessary" in planning to target Turning Point USA chapters in schools after violent campus clash.

item.title: Mamdani keeps Jessica Tisch as NYPD commissioner
item.description: Mayor-elect Zohran Mamdani's office announced on Wednesday that Jessica Tisch will remain the New York City Police Department commissioner.
